content: = 12 sts christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 11 egap round 2 *chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chs chain 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 5 chs chain 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chs single_crochet in st of branch on the left single_crochet in last 5 chs slip_stitch in next single_crochet of round 1 chain 8 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 6 chain slip_stitch in next single_crochet of round 1** repeat 5 more times from * to ** = 6 tripled branches & 6 single branches finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends finishing 1 soak the snowflakes in the bowl of fabric stiffener until saturated 2 remove your snowflakes one-by-one from the stiffener squeezing the extra liquid out of the snowflakes 3 stretch & pin your snowflakes onto the block- ing board photo c-1 4 allow to dry & then carefully peel the snowflakes from the board please check out this >> free tutorial << on how to make your own fabric stiffener c-1 all done i hope you had a lot of fun christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 12 egap from the designer i am a knit & crochet designer from southern ontario canada i love working with yarns textiles & other fibers to express my ideas i also enjoy graphic design that helps to enhance my pdf patterns and books if you have any questions or need help with my patterns please feel free to e-mail me & i will get back to you as soon as possible i hope you enjoy this pattern as much as i enjoyed creating it h pl a e v a e s e q u se e n st d i o m ns e a n email @ a i r r i arott c o m ir a r h ott appy crafting terms of use pattern all irarott® patterns images and graphs are copyrighted all rights are owned by irarott increase no part of irarott® patterns may be reproduced transmitted broadcasted translated used for derivative works or published in any form or by any means without prior written permission from irarott increase do not copy share resell or forward irarott® patterns commercial use of any photo that belongs to irarott increase is strictly prohibited unauthorized distribution or duplication is a violation of applicable laws finished item you are more than welcome to sell items made from irarott® patterns credit to the designer is greatly appreciated but not required irarott® photos cannot be used for selling purposes or modified in any way you may not use the irarott® trademark in your listing name or as a tag you may include pattern from irarott com in your listing description safety regulations use
